name: Princess: Where Is My Diamond?
description:
Enter the dream of the beautiful Princess.
The princess has fallen asleep and just started dreaming about having a lot of precious diamonds to create new amazing jewelry for her public appearances.
The only problem is that the diamonds to create her jewelry are still trapped in a cave in some sort of magic labyrinth.
It will be your tasks to unblock the gems and make them roll down into the castle in order to make the princess dream have a happy end.

Each level is a challenging physics based puzzle game and each level requires skills, fantasy and big logic to be solved.

How to play: Use your finger to cut through the rock and make the precious jewels flow into strategic places to open a path and make them fall towards the castle.

Use the TNT boxes to blast the rock away and open a path where the stone is too hard to get through.

Advice: There are some magic tornados that will teleport the gems to another place. Choose your moves carefully as it is not always an advantage to use them.

If you would like to get 3 stars and reach a higher score you will have to collect all three of them, before the diamonds reach the castle.

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ Many puzzles for you to enjoy
✔ Challenging physics game play
✔ Many levels to be played
✔ Background music and sounds

This is a free application. Download it and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
